00034 #define PUBLISH_PRICE_DURATION_UNTIL_CHANGED                 0xFFFF
00035 #define PUBLISH_PRICE_START_TIME_NOW                         0x0000
00036 #define PUBLISH_PRICE_PRICE_RATIO_IS_NOT_USED                0xFF
00037 #define PUBLISH_PRICE_GENERATION_PRICE_RATIO_IS_NOT_USED     0xFF
00038 #define PUBLISH_PRICE_GENERATION_PRICE_IS_NOT_USED           0xFFFFFFFF
00039 #define PUBLISH_PRICE_NUMBER_OF_BLOCK_THRESHOLDS_IS_NOT_USED 0xFF
00040 #define PUBLISH_PRICE_CONTROL_IS_NOT_USED                    0x00
00041 #define PUBLISH_PRICE_RATE_LABEL_MAX_LEN                     12
00042 
00046 #define PRICE_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT     0
00047 
00051 #define PRICE_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT     0
00052 
00056 #define PRICE_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT  4
00057 
00061 #define GET_CURRENT_PRICE_COMMAND_ID      0x00
00062 #define GET_SCHEDULED_PRICES_COMMAND_ID   0x01
00063 #define PRICE_ACKNOWLEDGEMENT_COMMAND_ID  0x02
00064 #define PUBLISH_PRICE_COMMAND_ID          0x00
00065 
00066 #define PRICE_CLUSTER_COMMANDS(getCurrentPriceInd, publishPriceInd, getScheduledPricesInd, priceAcknowledgementInd) \
00067     DEFINE_COMMAND(getCurrentPriceCommand, GET_CURRENT_PRICE_COMMAND_ID, COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), getCurrentPriceInd), \
00068     DEFINE_COMMAND(publishPriceCommand, PUBLISH_PRICE_COMMAND_ID, COMMAND_OPTIONS(SERVER_TO_CLIENT, ZCL_RESPONSE_CONTROLLED_BY_PAYLOAD, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), publishPriceInd), \
00069     DEFINE_COMMAND(getScheduledPricesCommand, GET_SCHEDULED_PRICES_COMMAND_ID, COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), getScheduledPricesInd), \
00070     DEFINE_COMMAND(priceAcknowledgementCommand, PRICE_ACKNOWLEDGEMENT_COMMAND_ID, COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), priceAcknowledgementInd)
00071 
00072 #define PRICE_CLUSTER_ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00073   { \
00074     .id = PRICE_CLUSTER_ID, \
00075     .options = {.type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_APPLICATION_LINK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY}, \
00076     .attributesAmount = PRICE_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00077     .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00078     .commandsAmount = PRICE_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00079     .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00080   }
00081

00083   { \
00084     .id = PRICE_CLUSTER_ID, \
00085     .options = {.type = ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_APPLICATION_LINK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY}, \
00086     .attributesAmount = PRICE_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00087     .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00088     .commandsAmount = PRICE_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00089     .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00090   }

00117 BEGIN_PACK
00121 typedef struct PACK
00122 {
00123   uint32_t        providerId;
00124   uint8_t         rateLabelLength;
00125   uint8_t         rateLabel[PUBLISH_PRICE_RATE_LABEL_MAX_LEN];
00126   uint32_t        issuerEventId;
00127   ZCL_UTCTime_t   currentTime;
00128   uint8_t         unitOfMeasure;
00129   uint16_t        currency;
00130   struct PACK
00131   {
00132     LITTLE_ENDIAN_OCTET(2,(
00133       uint8_t priceTrailDigit : 4,
00134       uint8_t priceTier : 4
00135     ))
00136   } priceTrailDigitPriceTier;
00137   struct PACK
00138   {
00139     LITTLE_ENDIAN_OCTET(2,(
00140       uint8_t numberOfPriceTiers : 4,
00141       uint8_t registerTier : 4
00142     ))
00143   } numberOfPriceTiersRegisterTier;
00144   ZCL_UTCTime_t   startTime;
00145   uint16_t        durationInMinutes;
00146   uint32_t        price;
00147   uint8_t         priceRatio;
00148   uint32_t        generationPrice;
00149   uint8_t         generationPriceRatio;
00150   uint32_t        alternateCostDelivered;
00151   uint8_t         alternateCostUnit;
00152   uint8_t         alternateCostTrailingDigit;
00153   uint8_t         numberOfBlockThresholds;
00154   uint8_t         priceControl;
00155 //  uint32_t        standingCharge;
00156 } ZCL_PublishPrice_t;
00157 
00161 typedef struct PACK
00162 {
00163   LITTLE_ENDIAN_OCTET(2,(
00164     uint8_t requestorRxOnWhenIdle :1, 
00165     uint8_t reserved              :7  
00166   ))
00167 } ZCL_GetCurrentPrice_t;
00168 
00172 typedef struct PACK
00173 {
00174   ZCL_UTCTime_t   startTime;
00175   uint8_t         numberOfEvents;
00176 } ZCL_GetScheduledPrices_t;
00177 
00181 typedef struct PACK
00182 {
00183   uint32_t      providerId;
00184   uint32_t      issuerEventId;
00185   ZCL_UTCTime_t priceAckTime;
00186   uint8_t       control;
00187 } ZCL_PriceAcknowledgement_t;
00188 END_PACK

00194 typedef struct
00195 {
00197   struct
00198   {
00199     ZCL_CommandId_t       id;       
00200     ZclCommandOptions_t   options;  
00201 
00207     ZCL_Status_t (*getCurrentPrice)(ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing, uint8_t payloadLength, ZCL_GetCurrentPrice_t *payload);
00208   } getCurrentPriceCommand;
00209 
00211   struct
00212   {
00213     ZCL_CommandId_t       id;       
00214     ZclCommandOptions_t   options;  
00215 
00221     ZCL_Status_t (*getScheduledPrices)(ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing, uint8_t payloadLength, ZCL_GetScheduledPrices_t *payload);
00222   } getScheduledPricesCommand;
00223 
00225   struct
00226   {
00227     ZCL_CommandId_t       id;       
00228     ZclCommandOptions_t   options;  
00229 
00235     ZCL_Status_t (*publishPrice)(ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing, uint8_t payloadLength, ZCL_PublishPrice_t *payload);
00236   } publishPriceCommand;
00237 
00239   struct
00240   {
00241     ZCL_CommandId_t       id;       
00242     ZclCommandOptions_t   options;  
00243 
00249     ZCL_Status_t (*priceAcknowledgement)(ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing, uint8_t payloadLength, ZCL_PriceAcknowledgement_t *payload);
00250   } priceAcknowledgementCommand;
00251 
00252 } ZCL_PriceClusterCommands_t;
